mapper.select: SELECT illustno, illust, illust_saved, illust_thumb, illust_size, conversationno, rdate FROM illustration ORDER BY illustno DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE illustration SET illust = #{illust}, illust_saved = #{illust_saved}, illust_thumb = #{illust_thumb}, illust_size = #{illust_size} WHERE illustno = #{illustno}
mapper.select: SELECT diaryno, title, ddate, weatherno, emno, summary, illustno FROM diary WHERE ddate BETWEEN #{start_date} AND #{end_date} ORDER BY ddate DESC
